text:
1. Page Title: A Hot Evening

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Young man hesitates outside his garret.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young Man: "I can't face her again..."
       • Young Man: "Just slip past, like a cat."

   
   - Panel 2 — Setup: He glances at the open kitchen door.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young Man: "That sick feeling returns."
       • Young Man: "Why am I so afraid?"

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man, burdened by debt and isolation, hesitates to leave his cramped garret, fearing encounters with his landlady and others.
